Reviews.Title: great buy!
Reviews.Author: Sandra Liflander
Reviews.Content: just returned from a trip and camera performed beautifully in all lighting conditions, and without me having the time to learn very much about it.

Reviews.Title: Great Combo Package
Reviews.Author: Howardboy
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, great zoom, extra batteries. Tripod is a little flimsey but useable. I would recomend this to anyone who does not have a lot of experience like myself.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Olympus SZ-16 iHS Digital Camera (Silver) + <2> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card + <3> Spare Li-50B/Li-92B Battery +
<4> Battery Charger for LI-50B + <5> Lowepro Rezo 50 Camera Case + <6> Zeikos 50" Compact Tripod +
<7> HDMI to Micro-HDMI Cable (6') + <8> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <9> PD 5pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<10> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <11> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors + <12> Image Recovery Software
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus SZ-16 iHS Digital Camera (Silver) with 32GB Card + Case + Battery & Charger + Tripod + HDMI Cable + Accessory Kit
